Title: Provides that revenues from buyouts of Mitchell-Lama projects must be used for affordable housing purposes
Summary: Provides that revenues from buyouts of Mitchell-Lama projects, whether state-aided or municipally-aided, must be used for affordable housing purposes by the state or the municipality; creates a special state fund, the Mitchell-Lama buyout affordable housing fund; provides that such fund's revenues may only be used for housing projects meeting Mitchell-Lama eligibility criteria.
LawCode: Add ยง36-b, Priv Hous Fin L; add ยง92-ii, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law and the state finance law, in relation to dedicating Mitchell-Lama buyout revenues to affordable housing
